title: Tracy McGrady, Warriors Back In The Finals, The Heat Are Dead And Fyre Fest Of The Week
description:
The Warriors are back in the Finals for the 6th time in 8 years and we're back rooting for how much fun they can be. (00:02:13-00:12:55) Big Cat might be dying after the picture of he, pft, and Tracy McGrady is put on the internet. (00:12:56-00:20:17) We talk Heat/Celtics and Nathan MacKinnon scoring the coolest goal ever. (00:21:24-00:36:09) Tracy McGrady joins the show to talk about his one on one basketball league, the biggest what if from his career, who he has winning the finals, and of course his enormous pants. (00:37:23-01:17:45) We finish with Fyre Fest of the week and a soft hand contest.Â (01:18:52-01:42:02)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
